name: SCRATCH MYSTERY'S NOSE (DOLL EYE FAN-GAME)
description:
IMPORTANTE DISCLAMER:

even tho this is a DOLL EYE fan game that does not mean i support TWISTED-DOCTOR, this game was mad for those who still have mystery as a comfort character and/or kinnnie

please dont attack me or anyone i may mentioned or has played the game

this game was made for fun, and for others to have fun, if you feel uncomfortable in anyway you dont need to play this, instead go do what you want to do 👍

also if you found any bugs please tell me about them in the comments! thats why im opening them!
